item.description:
Haunted Overload is simply one of the most creative and unique haunted attractions in New England. Now located on the 78 acre Coppal House Farm on Route 155 in Lee NH. The show was voted one of the top 13 haunted attractions in the country when it was still a charity home haunt in Exeter NH.

http://www.hauntedove...

From Massachusetts:
Take Route 95N to Exit 2 in NH.
Go through the tolls, bearing right onto 101W towards Manchester
Take Exit 7 (Route 125)
Turn right onto Route 125, travel 4.2 miles
Turn right onto Route 155, travel 2.2 miles
We're on your left hand side!


Tickets need to be pre-purchased $17.50 online...http://shop.hauntedov...

This venue is generally crowded so lets plan to be there 1/2 - 1 hr early.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send my phone number to members who have RSVP'd a day before the event.
item.name: Haunted Overload This Halloween
